str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be aged, act as an ambassador. From the base of presbuteros; to be a senior, i.e. act as a representative.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To change, exchange, reconcile. From kata and allasso; to change mutually, i.e. to compound a difference.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
